characters.Name: A Pile of Weewaks
characters.CharSpecial:
Can attack every enemy in their space in melee. Can use multiple Melee cards in a single melee, but each can be used only once.
Suffer double the final damage from Area attacks. Cannot use Armor.

characters.Name: Ace Cannon
characters.CharSpecial: +3 Range with Thrown, Grenade.

characters.Name: Adigan The Rat
characters.CharSpecial: -1 Damage rating with Melee cards, minimum 0.

characters.Name: Agent 911
characters.CharSpecial:
On all Hit attempts against 911, check Luck:
� 0 or 1:  Enemy hits himself. Make a Damage challenge against his own Armor.
� 3 or 7:  Resolve attack normally.
� All else:  Attack misses. 

On a Hit or Adventure by Agent 911, 
check Luck. A 7 is an automatic Amaze.

characters.Name: Amanda Pierce
characters.CharSpecial: Loner. Cannot trade cards, but can use the Vault.

characters.Name: Annah Mischkev
characters.CharSpecial:
On a Squeak on any challenge by Annah, one enemy must reveal 1 card, enemy�s choice.
Before being dismissed, Annah can instead choose to go to any Dome 
containing an ally.

characters.Name: Annie Oakley
characters.CharSpecial:
During OpFire with Aim and Point weapons, can accept a -2 Hit penalty and gain +1 Damage rating. Make this decision before each Hit.
+1 OpFire with Aim and Point weapons.

characters.Name: Aramis
characters.CharSpecial:
Cannot OpFire at Women, Children and Lords. Must always choose to imprison such enemies.

In Melee, Wits is treated as 0.

characters.Name: Ardin Glynn
characters.CharSpecial: Diplomatic protocol. Cannot attack while within 2 aura of any allied or enemy team marker.

characters.Name: Arkin Ironshanks
characters.StandardAbilities: Swing, Grenade, Thrown, Crossbow, Not Give Cards
characters.CharSpecial: +1 Speed if enters a Cavern space during move. +1 Armor and +2 Wits for combat purposes only when in a Cavern space.

characters.Name: Atalanta
characters.CharSpecial:
No cards can be traded in Atalanta�s space.
Ignores allied mental abilities.

characters.Name: Atalanta
characters.CharSpecial:
No cards can be traded in Atalanta�s space.
Ignores allied mental abilities.

characters.Name: Avindel
characters.CharSpecial:
Move cost 1 through Ancient Woods, Swamp, Rough, Water.
Suffers -5 Hit and Adventure when on a Colonial, Modern or Future space.

characters.Name: Baba Yaga
characters.CharSpecial:
Can fly.
At melee start, can challenge one character in Baba Yaga�s space, her Wits vs. their Honor. On Pass/Amaze, that enemy fights on her side in that melee. On Squeak or worse, Baba Yaga takes 1 damage. You cannot look at the enemy�s unrevealed cards.

characters.Name: Baron Von Krule
characters.CharSpecial:
Free Action: If Von Krule is inside the enemy Team�s base, he can discard 2 cards and remove one enemy team marker of 
his choice from the map.

characters.Name: Benedict Arnold
characters.CharSpecial: When an ally Amazes an adventure, place a marker on Arnold. When Arnold Amazes an adventure, or an ally discards an Elite card in his space, remove all markers. If at any point Arnold has 4 markers, he switches sides. Afterward, remove all markers and restart the process.

characters.Name: Beowulf
characters.CharSpecial: Boastful. At start of Free Action, Beowulf and all allies in his space must reveal all cards.

characters.Name: Big Herr
characters.CharSpecial:
When on a Modern space:
� If an allied henchman is in his space, enemy characters cannot attack him.
� Herr�s Adventures are never worse than a Pass.
� On card-payment adventures, Big Herr instead draws 1 card and passes the challenge.

characters.Name: Bill Hickok
characters.StandardAbilities: Powder Pistol, Revolver, Energy Pistol, Long Pistol
characters.CharSpecial: During OpFire, can use two Point weapons at the same time. These two do not restrict each other, so each gun can fire at the same target.

characters.Name: Blackbeard
characters.CharSpecial:
Can move across Deep Water at a cost of 2, but cannot end turn in Deep Water.
Pirate treasure. Once per game, if on the Wailing Cave space during the
Adventure phase, draw one Elite card.

characters.Name: Bladed Terror
characters.CharSpecial: Can cross Cliffsides at an extra move cost of 3.

characters.Name: Boolean
characters.CharSpecial:
On Adventures, Boolean can reject the result and draw again. He cannot draw a third time.
After drawing cards for an Adventure, can discard one and draw a new one of the same type.
If banished, Boolean instead moves to any empty Dome of his choice.

characters.Name: Boris Andronov
characters.CharSpecial: Cannot choose to imprison a killed enemy character unless required to do so.

characters.Name: Boudica
characters.CharSpecial:
Cannot attack enemy characters until an enemy attempts a Hit against her, or until an allied character is killed (not imprisoned). Gains +2 Hit against the enemy that first attacked 
her or killed the ally.

characters.Name: Brad
characters.CharSpecial:
On all challenges, ignore ratings. Simply check Luck:
� Hit or Damage: Luck 0-4 = Fopp, 5-9 = Squeak
� Adventure:  Luck 0-2 = Fopp, 3-9 = Squeak
Brad�s Speed is 8 if any enemy is within 5 aura.
Cannot end Move in a space with an enemy.

characters.Name: Bruno Brincelli
characters.CharSpecial:
Gains +2 melee Hit against targets that have a worse Strength rating than Bruno. 
Gains +2 Adventure against Strength challenges that have a worse Strength rating than Bruno.

characters.Name: Camden Drake
characters.CharSpecial: If in a space with an unleashed enemy Bot at the start of Melee, remove the Bot and give the card to Camden.

characters.Name: Cassie Sashay
characters.CharSpecial:
Gains +1 Speed, Armor and React when using a Mount. Enemies in Cassie�s space at start of Melee must give all revealed Mounts to Cassie.
Lasso. When using her natural melee attack, she gains +1 Hit and +2 Wits. If she hits, the 
target loses all upcoming attacks.

characters.Name: Catspaw
characters.CharSpecial:
Move cost 0 through Building, 1 through Rough.
Mental ability. Enemies within 4 aura of Catspaw cannot attempt Hits unless they have equal or higher Wits than Catspaw.
On Adventures, can use Wits instead of the normal rating, but suffers 1 damage afterward. On an actual Wits adventure, she instead can choose to gain a +5 bonus and suffer 1 damage.

characters.Name: Cayriss
characters.CharSpecial: Can attack twice in melee, but the second attack must be against a different enemy than the first and always uses Cayriss's natural melee weapon.

characters.Name: Chief Joseph
characters.CharSpecial:
For move, treat all Colonial spaces as Clear; moving through but not ending in Obstacle, Fire, Deep Water and Dome. Only Cavern Walls block movement. Allies that begin in Joseph�s space gain this bonus as long as they move with him.
Enemies cannot OpFire at Joseph in a Colonial space.

characters.Name: Clara Barton
characters.CharSpecial: Free Action. Choose one:

characters.Name: Coach Quinn
characters.CharSpecial: Mental ability. Allies within 3 aura gain +1 on Adventures. Enemies within 3 aura suffer -1 Adventure. Does not apply to Quinn himself.

characters.Name: Commodore Blaylock
characters.CharSpecial: Begin with 2 Experience markers.

characters.Name: Corporal Janus
characters.CharSpecial:
+1 Hit and +1 Damage with all attacks 
against Beings, Bots and Machines.

characters.Name: Damon Raven
characters.StandardAbilities: Energy Pistol, Auto Pistol, Energy Rifle, Auto Rifle
characters.CharSpecial:
Gains +5 Hit with Energy Pistol, Auto Pistol, Energy Rifle, and Auto Rifle.
Gains +5 on Adventures involving Aim or Point.

characters.Name: Darija Dugrebsky
characters.CharSpecial:
Free Action: If on her HQ, discard 1 Elite card and draw 1 new henchman plus 1 Secret 
card. Afterward, Darija is dismissed.

characters.Name: Davy Crockett
characters.CharSpecial: Move cost 1 through Woods and Swamp.

characters.Name: Daylight and Dusk
characters.CharSpecial:
D&D are two separate characters. Use left ratings for Daylight, right for Dusk. Both are immune to side switching.
Daylight begins the game imprisoned.

characters.Name: Devon Regal
characters.CharSpecial:
Can do each of the following once per game:
� After moving and after enemy OpFire, Devon can take one shot with a ranged weapon as if it were the Fire phase.
� Free Action: Place Devon on the Main Gate space inside the enemy�s Team Base.
� Free Action: Devon is dismissed.

characters.Name: Diaz El Gato
characters.CharSpecial:
Taunt. Mental ability. Enemies cannot fire at Diaz at a range of 2 or less.
+1 Damage with Blades. While carrying a Blade, gains +2 React and Melee for all purposes.

characters.Name: Dingo Jake
characters.CharSpecial:
Does not need to stop in a space containing an enemy if that space is Swamp.
Ignore Swamp for Jake�s ranged attacks.
Move cost 1 through Swamp.

characters.Name: Dirk Slade
characters.CharSpecial: For each point of Health lost below 6, Dirk gains +1 Hit and +1 Power with all attacks. He also gains +1 React and +1 Stealth per point, but for combat purposes only.

characters.Name: Dr. Hume
characters.CharSpecial:
Invisibility: Does not need to stop in an enemy space. Gains +6 Stealth for all purposes. Against enemies that cannot negate the Stealth bonus, Gains +4 React and melee Hit for combat only.
Free action: One enemy in Hume�s space must reveal 1 card.

characters.Name: Dr. Marla Ulf
characters.CharSpecial:
Ulf is only one character who is duplicated. When entering map, place 3 Ulfs in the Dome. Keep the other 3 off-map. 
Cards for all Ulfs are placed in one set, with a 4 card limit. Only one Ulf can use an item in a turn.
Ulfs cannot increase max Health. If one is damaged, imprisoned, or switches sides, it is removed. If only one Ulf remains, that Ulf can be killed, imprisoned or switch sides.
On an Amaze Adventure by any Ulf, a 
new Ulf appears at the HQ. Max 6 Ulfs.

characters.Name: Dr. Memnar
characters.CharSpecial:
Horrid transformation. Free Action: You must check luck:
0-4 = Memnar is the scientist. Use left ratings.
5-9 = Memnar is the monster. Use right ratings, and cannot use cards.

characters.Name: Dr. Memnar
characters.CharSpecial:
Horrid transformation. Free Action: You must check luck:
0-4 = Memnar is the scientist. Use left ratings.
5-9 = Memnar is the monster. Use right ratings, and cannot use cards.

characters.Name: Dr. Pennopolis
characters.CharSpecial:
Free Action: Can give one of his unrevealed cards to an ally anywhere on the map.
Free Action: One allied character in Pennopolis' space challenges Intellect versus 5. On Squeak or better, the ally gains an Experience marker.
Free Action: Once per game, move one ally on the map to Pennopolis' space.

characters.Name: El Cid
characters.CharSpecial:
After death (not imprisonment), El Cid remains in the game. He is removed at the end of his third Free Action following his death, or at game end.
During this time, El Cid ignores damage, but dies if imprisoned or switches sides.

characters.Name: Eliot Ness
characters.CharSpecial:
When dismissed, do not check for placement. Go to any empty Dome. Treat banish as a 
normal dismiss instead.

characters.Name: Enrak The Fury
characters.CharSpecial:
Attacks twice in melee. Must use same weapon. If weapon is lost on the first attack, the second attack is lost. The attacks can be used against different enemies.
Cannot use Shields or Body Armor.

characters.Name: Erik Merit
characters.CharSpecial:
Erik begins pacifist. He returns to being pacifist whenever he kills/imprisons an enemy character.
Pacifist: Erik cannot attack or use Creatures.
Wronged: If pacifist, and an enemy attempts to Hit Erik, Erik becomes wronged at the end of that phase. While wronged, Erik has no restrictions. He ignores Strength/Intellect restrictions for all cards.
Cracked: On an adventure Fopp, Erik cracks. Discard all cards. He cannot trade cards or use the Vault. He can attack normally.

characters.Name: Erin Shrike
characters.CharSpecial: For Erin�s ranged attacks, ignore all enemy Stealth bonuses due to special abilities, treasure and invisibility. The target gains one less Stealth bonus for each space of terrain � for example, only +1 for Woods and +2 for Building.

characters.Name: Ettamerra
characters.CharSpecial:
Territorial. After board setup, select a space on the map as Ettamerra's lair. When within 6 aura of the lair, ratings with an arrow gain +1, 
+2 within 4 aura, +3 within 2, +4 in same space.
Slingtail. +2 Range with Grenades. 
+2 Range and Power with Thrown.

characters.Name: Fanged Tracnids
characters.CharSpecial:
Begin with only 4 current Health. Free Action: If in a Water or Swamp space, increase current Health by 1.
Gains +1 Strength and Intellect for each 
point of current Health above 4.

characters.Name: Fen Lin
characters.CharSpecial:
When using his natural melee attack, Fen Lin can attack every enemy in his space during melee.
Always gets his shirt off. Cannot use Armor.

characters.Name: Finnabar Taint
characters.CharSpecial: On all of Taint�s Hit and Adventure challenges, treat Fopps and Amazes as Fail.

characters.Name: First Marine Quog
characters.StandardAbilities: Energy Pistol, Energy Rifle, Grenade, Heavy
characters.CharSpecial: Immediately upon owning any revealed Pet, Mount or Fodder card, Quog must consume it. Discard the card and increase Quog's current AND maximum Health by 2.

characters.Name: Flicker
characters.CharSpecial:
Instead of attacking in Melee, Flicker can choose to challenge her Wits versus a target�s React. On Amaze, she steals 1 card and is dismissed.
Move cost 1 through Building. Can cross cliffsides at an extra move cost of 3.

characters.Name: Frostdancer
characters.CharSpecial:
Only one enemy can attack Frostdancer in a Melee phase. The enemy chooses the attacker.
Cannot enter her own team base. Cannot end Move in the same space as an allied character.

characters.Name: Gana
characters.CharSpecial:
At Melee start, can shapeshift to an enemy character in her space. While shifted:
� She has all ratings of the enemy except Health, Honor, Wits and Intellect. If the enemy has split ratings (left and right), use the ratings in effect at that moment.
� She gains none of the enemy special abilities except Flight and natural ranged attacks.
She can revert to normal in her Free Action, but cannot return to a previous form afterward.

characters.Name: Gen. James Gavin
characters.CharSpecial: Mental ability. Allies within 3 aura gain +1 Armor. Does not apply to Gavin himself.

characters.Name: Genghis Khan
characters.CharSpecial: Mental ability. Enemies within 3 aura suffer -1 Wits, React, Hit, and Power. The Power penalty applies to all weapons.

characters.Name: Geronimo
characters.CharSpecial:
Enemies cannot OpFire at Geronimo in a space containing Woods, Swamp, or Rough.
Can trade only with Colonial allies.

characters.Name: Giuseppe Garibaldi
characters.CharSpecial:
Free Action: If within 5 aura of an 
enemy team marker, 
gain 1 Experience marker.

characters.Name: Gregory
characters.CharSpecial:
Gregory and allies within 4 aura always Amaze adventures on Luck 7.
Free Action: All enemy and allied characters in Gregory�s space are healed 1 Health, but not Gregory himself.
On any Hit attempt by a character against Gregory, check Luck. On 6 or 7, the enemy switches sides after the attack is resolved.
No melee can occur in Gregory�s space, except that enemies can attack Gregory.

characters.Name: Greymede
characters.CharSpecial:
Free Action: Can pair with an allied character having 5+ Honor in Greymede�s space. They must remain together, even in dismissal and banishment. For movement, use the ally's Speed, special abilities and cards. Pairing ends if one is killed, imprisoned or switches sides.
While paired, both gain +1 to all ratings except Damage. On an adventure, use the best rating between them, and both draw full cards and Honor bonuses if successful.

characters.Name: Grok
characters.CharSpecial:
Stupid. On Hit challenges when using a weapon card, check Luck. On 0-1, discard the weapon and the attack fails.
Grok may be stupid, but he can find a trigger and the dangerous end. Grok ignores the Intellect restriction for all Ranged and Melee cards.

characters.Name: Hakan
characters.CharSpecial:
An ally giving cards to Hakan loses 1 Health per card. Can receive cards from any ally, ignoring their special trade restrictions.
Free Action:  Choose (and reveal) one Ranged or Melee card in Hakan's inventory. He can give that card to any ally on the map.

characters.Name: Hamid Al-Duri
characters.CharSpecial:
Move cost 1 through Rough.
Leave killed character markers on the map. When Hamid enters a marker space, he draws one Common card per marker. 
Remove the marker afterward.

characters.Name: Headless Horseman
characters.CharSpecial:
Spook. Mental ability. Enemies that begin their Free Action within 2 aura gain +1 Speed but cannot adventure or attack during their turn. Enemies that begin in a Building or with an ally ignore Spook.
The Head. Natural ranged attack using the Throw rating, as shown.
Cannot use Transports.

characters.Name: Helene Lang
characters.CharSpecial:
Treats all Cliffs as Slope for movement.
Move Cost 1 through Rough.

characters.Name: Henry Kirk
characters.CharSpecial:
Immune to any mental abilities that Kirk wishes. Immune to side-switching.
Can move through but not remain 
in Deep Water at move cost 2.

characters.Name: Homer Morgan
characters.CharSpecial: Trusty hickory hardbat. If attacked by a weapon that uses the Throw rating, check Luck on the Hit. If 3-5, the attack fails and the attacker hits himself. Make a Damage challenge against the attacker.

characters.Name: Ian Welsh
characters.CharSpecial: Ian and all allies cannot suffer Health loss from treasure cards other than Ranged, Melee and Creature cards.

characters.Name: Illinth
characters.CharSpecial:
Begin at 3 Health. Cannot use Pets or Mounts.
Pain Feeder. Each time any enemy or ally (not Illinth) within 5 aura takes damage, Illinth heals 1 Health. Cannot heal in any other way.
STAR skills equal current Health.
ARROW skills equal 10 minus current Health.

characters.Name: Ironhead McCray
characters.CharSpecial: Natural melee attacks suffer -1 Damage rating against Ironhead.

characters.Name: Ivymane
characters.CharSpecial:
Move cost 1 through Woods and Swamp. Gains +2 additional Stealth in Woods, Swamp.
Mental ability. Men and Fairies must have Honor 7+ to attack Ivymane in melee or with a ranged attack at 2 spaces or less.
Pets cannot attack Ivymane.

characters.Name: Jack Hammer
characters.CharSpecial: If Jack moves only one space in his Move phase, he can take one shot with a ranged weapon after OpFire is complete, as if it were the Fire phase.

characters.Name: Jade
characters.CharSpecial:
Can carry but not use cards except Lith cards. 
Move cost 7 through Building, Swamp. Move cost 3 through Woods, Rough.

characters.Name: Jedediah Smith
characters.CharSpecial: If a Pet is killed within 3 aura of Jed, he heals 1 Health and draws 1 Common and 1 Secret card.

characters.Name: Jenny McGiddey
characters.CharSpecial:
If an enemy Fopps a melee attempt against Jenny, he hits himself. He must make a Damage challenge against his own Armor rating.
Mental ability. On melee Hit attempts against Jenny, Jenny adds her Wits to her React, and the attacker adds his Wits to his Melee.
Once per game, on any challenge, can use Wits rating instead of the normal rating.

characters.Name: Jerry Gillis
characters.CharSpecial:
Can use all cards, ignoring Strength and Intellect restrictions.
Jerry draws 1 card whenever he is banished.

characters.Name: Joe Tascoe
characters.CharSpecial: Eerie space-time portal. Free Action: Joe is dismissed. Joe can use the portal every turn if wished.

characters.Name: Jolie La Ravissant
characters.CharSpecial:
Mental ability. Enemies suffer -5 melee Hit against Jolie and cannot OpFire at her.
Mental ability. Free Action: Steal 1 card from each enemy Man in her space. 
Mental ability. On a Hit attempt against Jolie, check Luck. On 3, the enemy switches sides and the attack fails. If the enemy is a Man, the switch occurs on Luck 3-4.

characters.Name: Joshua Jordan
characters.CharSpecial:
Normally, use the left ratings.
Free Action:  Can discard one card to become the superhero until the beginning of his next turn. Use the right ratings during this time, and can fly.

characters.Name: Joshua Jordan
characters.CharSpecial:
Normally, use the left ratings.
Free Action:  Can discard one card to become the superhero until the beginning of his next turn. Use the right ratings during this time, and can fly.

characters.Name: Kassina
characters.CharSpecial:
Normally, Kassina is in human form. Use the left ratings.
Free Action:  Discard one card to become the dragon until the beginning of her next turn.
While Dragon: Use right ratings. Can fly. Cannot use cards. Breath attack using Point rating.

characters.Name: Kassina
characters.CharSpecial:
Normally, Kassina is in human form. Use the left ratings.
Free Action:  Discard one card to become the dragon until the beginning of her next turn.
While Dragon: Use right ratings. Can fly. Cannot use cards. Breath attack using Point rating.

characters.Name: Kidd
characters.CharSpecial:
Hideout. After map setup, select a Rough space. When in that space, Kidd cannot attack, and no enemy can attempt a Hit against him.
Free Action: When in the Hideout space, Kidd heals 1 Health.

characters.Name: Kiri Silvertip
characters.CharSpecial:
+1 Damage with all attacks against Fiends.
Can fly.

characters.Name: Kit Carson
characters.CharSpecial: Move cost 1 in Woods, Swamp, Water, Rough.

characters.Name: Koguryo
characters.CharSpecial: Cannot use Melee cards.

characters.Name: Kraator
characters.CharSpecial: Cannot use Armor, Vehicles, Bots or Gadgets.

characters.Name: Kristina Karlsdotter
characters.CharSpecial: Can trade cards with allies within 2 aura, rather than only with allies in her space.

characters.Name: Leapgrip
characters.CharSpecial:
Chameleonic. Gains +3 Stealth for all purposes.
Can use Ranged cards only against characters with a revealed Ranged card, and Melee cards only against characters with a revealed Melee card. Can freely attack henchmen and creatures.

characters.Name: Leo Penney
characters.CharSpecial: After looking at newly drawn cards won through an adventure, Leo can risk one of the cards. Check Luck:  0-3 = Card is lost, 4-5 = Discard the card, draw a new card of the same type, 6-9 = Draw another card of the same type.

characters.Name: Lia Vestri
characters.CharSpecial:
Lia counts as two characters for all purposes. Start both Lia markers in the same Dome. 
When one Lia dies, the other gains +1 to all ratings except Speed, Health and Damage.

characters.Name: Lianka The Gazer
characters.CharSpecial:
Can treat card-payment challenges as 7-rated Wits challenges instead. Squeak+ is success, Fopp or Fail causes a banish.
Before the first turn, secretly write down the name of an enemy with 6 Honor or less. If Lianka is alone in that enemy�s space at the end of melee, he switches sides. �Alone� means no allies or enemies of any kind.

characters.Name: Little Shaun
characters.CharSpecial: Causes Damage +3 rather than +1 on an Amaze damage result with a melee attack.

characters.Name: Lt. Percy Smith
characters.CharSpecial:
Takes max 1 damage from each ranged attack.
Gains +1 Armor, +1 Melee, and ignores Strength restrictions for all cards if he owns a Mount.
Unaffected by all mental abilities.

characters.Name: Lyrra Swan
characters.CharSpecial: At start of her Adventure, if in a Labyrinth space containing her team�s marker, can move to any other Labyrinth space containing her team�s marker.

characters.Name: Marcus Aurus
characters.CharSpecial:
Cannot end Move in a space with an allied character. 
Cannot enter his team base. 
Ignores allied mental abilities.

characters.Name: Marley Kenyon
characters.CharSpecial: On any Adventure Squeak or Amaze result, draw one Secret card in addition to the normal results.

characters.Name: Martians
characters.CharSpecial: Can move through enemies without stopping.

characters.Name: Merissa of Ravenna
characters.CharSpecial:
Mental ability. Allies within 3 aura gain +1 Hit, and immunity to any mental abilities they wish.
Enemies cannot melee attack Merissa if 
a henchman of Merissa is in her space.

characters.Name: Mildred Stonegutter
characters.CharSpecial:
Gains a free melee attack against every enemy that uses Move points to move out of her space during their Move phase.
Harsh browbeatings. Mental ability. No enemy can fire at Mildred at a range of 2 spaces or less.

characters.Name: Milena Arrebato
characters.CharSpecial:
Can ignore any mental abilities she wishes.
Proud. Cannot receive cards in trade from allies, but can give away cards.

characters.Name: Minx and Jinx
characters.CharSpecial:
Natural ranged attack using Throw, as shown.
If an enemy in M&J�s space Fopps on a Hit, M&J steal 1 card from that enemy.

characters.Name: Miranda Fade
characters.CharSpecial:
When Miranda is killed and before the decision to imprison is made, check Luck. On 5-9, the attack does not harm Miranda in any way and she is immediately dismissed. A �K� card is still lost as if she were killed.
Allied characters within 4 aura of Miranda gain the same benefit as above, but on 7-9.

characters.Name: Misty Corona
characters.CharSpecial: Fashionable rocket boots. Can fly.

characters.Name: Mogred Ghan
characters.StandardAbilities: Stealth, No Card Limit, No Trade
characters.CharSpecial:
Floater Platform. Move cost 1 through Water, Rough. Does not fly.
Cannot use Transports.

characters.Name: Mr. Catskill
characters.CharSpecial:
Count the allied characters (not henchmen) killed by the enemy. Gains +1 Hit for the first, +1 Damage to all attacks for the second, and +1 Power to all attacks for each beyond two.
Example: Five allies are dead. Apply +1 Hit, +1 Damage and +3 Power.

characters.Name: Mulgoth Dominant
characters.CharSpecial:
Cannot use Armor, Transports, or Pets.
Cannot choose to imprison a killed enemy.

characters.Name: Napoleon
characters.CharSpecial:
Mental ability. Allies within 3 aura gain +1 Speed. Does not apply to Napoleon himself.
Move cost 1 in Woods, Building, Swamp, Rough and Water. No extra cost to move up Slope.

characters.Name: Ned Kelly
characters.CharSpecial:
Against Lords, Icons and Defenders, Ned gains +1 Hit and Damage on all attacks, and +2 React for melee defense only.
Cannot trade with Lords, Icons and Defenders.

characters.Name: Nerve Puppet
characters.CharSpecial:
Ignores imprisonment.
If Puppet causes the killing hit on a melee attack, the killed enemy becomes a host. If a character, the enemy becomes a Nerve Puppet with all of Puppet�s ratings and full Health. If a Pet, remove it from the map and give the card to the Puppet.

characters.Name: Neyana Unyielding
characters.CharSpecial:
Against Villains and Fiends, Neyana gains +1 Hit, +1 React, treats their Armor rating as 0 for all her attacks, and ignores their mental abilities.
Can declare one Melee card as holy during game. Weapon gains +1 Hit, and also gains +3 Power against Villains and Fiends. Only she may use.
Cannot use Bots or Vehicles. 
Suffers -2 on Stealth adventures.

characters.Name: Nimsea
characters.CharSpecial:
On Hits and Adventures by enemies within 4 aura and by Nimsea herself, check Luck. On 3 or 7, the result is Fopp.
Enemies and allies within 2 aura at start of movement suffer -2 Speed.
Can fly.

characters.Name: Norz Madfang
characters.CharSpecial:
Can use Hunter Pets as Mounts. The card remains in Norz' inventory. The Pet marker remains with Norz at all times. Use the Pet�s Speed and movement special abilities.
The Pet can attack any enemy but is lost if it kills an enemy. It cannot be unleashed or traded away. It can be attacked.

characters.Name: Odessa of Omri
characters.CharSpecial:
Free action: Draw 1 Common or Secret card. Usable every turn.
Cannot end Move in an allied character�s space unless that ally is a Lord or Icon.

characters.Name: Onyra of Omri
characters.CharSpecial:
At start of Melee, if Onyra and her henchman are in the same space as a lone enemy character, can make a Wits vs Wits challenge. Amaze = enemy is imprisoned. Fopp = Onyra is imprisoned.
Cannot give cards in trade unless she is given an equal number of cards in return.

characters.Name: Ophelia of Omri
characters.CharSpecial:
At end of her Move phase: one Adventurer, Commoner, Exemplar or Outcast in her space that does not have a card draws 1 Secret card.
Can carry only 2 cards.

characters.Name: Orpithu
characters.CharSpecial:
Ranged attack using Aim, as shown.
Suffers -3 Hit if not in a Cavern space.

characters.Name: Paradox
characters.CharSpecial: All allies and enemies within 4 aura have the ratings on their card reversed:  0=9, 1=8, 2=7, 3=6, 4=5. Does not affect Speed, Health, Armor, Power, Damage. Does not affect herself.

characters.Name: Paragonia
characters.CharSpecial:
Android. Unaffected by all mental abilities.
Rather than attempt a melee attack, enemies can challenge her Wits vs. Wits as their attack. On Amaze, they steal 1 card from Paragonia.
Paragonia must choose to imprison an enemy rather than kill.

characters.Name: Pat Garrett
characters.CharSpecial: +1 Hit with all attacks against enemies having a lower Honor than himself.

characters.Name: Perindor
characters.CharSpecial: Move cost 1 in Woods, Rough.

characters.Name: Perry Owens
characters.StandardAbilities: Long Rifle, Long Pistol, Powder Rifle, Powder Pistol, Revolver
characters.CharSpecial: When dismissed, Owens can go to a Dome of that type that contains an enemy.

characters.Name: Perseus
characters.CharSpecial:
Zeus�s Aid:  The first time that Perseus is banished, he draws 1 Elite card.
Hera�s Schemes: The first time that Perseus Amazes an adventure, one enemy of their choice draws a henchman.

characters.Name: Phillip Redlegs
characters.CharSpecial: On all challenges, check Luck. On 4, can choose to ignore the result and draw again.

characters.Name: Piccolo
characters.CharSpecial:
Can be attacked by only one enemy in a Melee. Piccolo chooses the enemy. This enemy can even be one that cannot attack Piccolo.
Cannot use Weapon cards. Must always choose to imprison an enemy rather than kill.

characters.Name: Prince Wallard Blatt
characters.CharSpecial: If killed, imprisoned or side-switched, Blatt instead resets. Remove Blatt and discard all of his cards. On his next Free Action, Blatt returns healed and free of effects, including side-switch. Draw new cards and dismiss as if he were starting the game.

characters.Name: Princess Sunglow
characters.CharSpecial:
Enemies must subtract their Honor from Hit attempts against Sunglow.
Mental Ability. Instead of attacking in melee, can target an enemy character in the space. Discard one card. Draw for Luck. If Luck is less than the enemy's Respect, he switches sides.
On Adventures, check Luck. On 5, Sunglow automatically Amazes.

characters.Name: Pvt. Sanchez
characters.CharSpecial: With Aim weapons, Sanchez can take a -2 Hit penalty to gain +1 Damage rating. Decide before attempting each Hit.

characters.Name: Pyraxian
characters.CharSpecial:
Can enter Fire at move cost 1. Can remain in Fire.
Ignore Fire for Pyraxian�s ranged attacks.

characters.Name: Quaal
characters.CharSpecial:
Swirling fog. +3 Stealth for combat purposes only. Allies in her space during the enemy Fire phase also gain +3 Stealth.
Static storm. Natural ranged attack, using Wits versus Stealth for Hit.

characters.Name: Raygun Roger
characters.CharSpecial:
Can use each of the following once per game:
Hyperboots. Speed is 12 for one turn.
Jetpack. Can fly, one turn. Not usable with Hyperboots.
Laser Ring. Point attack, Range 4, Single, Power 7, Damage 2. One shot only.
Omegawave Rescue Pod. Free Action: Roger is dismissed.

characters.Name: Reaver Mk. VII
characters.CharSpecial:
Free Action: If below 3 Health, gain 1 Health.
Malfunctioning. On an Adventure with Luck of 4, ignore the results. Instead, Reaver drops all cards and is banished.
Unaffected by mental abilities.
Cannot use Pets or Mounts.

characters.Name: Red River Roy
characters.CharSpecial:
Mental ability. Instead of a melee attack, can challenge every enemy in the space � Roy�s Wits versus enemy Wits:
� Pass: The enemy cannot use upcoming attacks against Roy (but can attack another target).
� Amaze: As Pass, and Roy steals 1 card.

Shiny White Outfit. Gains +2 Stealth 
when not in a Cavern space.

characters.Name: Rizzik The Red
characters.CharSpecial:
Flameburst. Ranged attack using Point, as shown.
Instead of moving, can simply reappear up to 3 spaces away, even through Cavern Walls. Cannot appear in a Dome. Enemies cannot OpFire at Rizzik if he 
moves this way.

characters.Name: Roaringrock
characters.CharSpecial:
At start of Melee, remove all unleashed enemy Pets in �Rock�s space and give the cards to �Rock.
At start of Melee, enemies in �Rock�s space must give all revealed Pet and 
Mount cards to �Rock.

characters.Name: Robert Morris
characters.CharSpecial:
When Morris draws cards because of an adventure, draw one additional Common card and place it in the Vault.
Morris can take as many cards as he wishes from the Vault.

characters.Name: Robin Hood
characters.CharSpecial:
Move cost 1 through Woods. Ignore Woods for Hood�s ranged attacks. Gains additional +2 Stealth when in Woods.
With a Bow, Hood gains an additional +2 Hit and +2 Range. If carrying a revealed Bow, Hood 
gains +2 on Adventures involving Throw.

characters.Name: Ronin Sajiro
characters.CharSpecial:
Gains an additional +1 on Ancient adventures.
Ritual suicide. If Sajiro Fopps an Adventure, he loses 1 Health, drops all cards, and is banished. Ignore the normal Fopp results.

characters.Name: Ryan Knight
characters.CharSpecial:
Gains +1 Hit against Beings and Fiends.
Ignores any mental abilities that he wishes.

characters.Name: Ryder
characters.CharSpecial:
Mental ability. Enemies within 4 aura that have Luck 4 on a Hit:  fail to hit, drop the weapon being used, and must reveal all cards. This 
includes attacks not directed at Ryder.

characters.Name: Sandman
characters.CharSpecial:
Move cost 0 in Building, 1 in Rough. 
On a melee hit, don�t check damage.  Challenge Intellect vs. Intellect (Creatures use Wits):
� Amaze = imprisoned (Creatures are killed)
� Squeak/Pass = target takes 2 damage,  drops all cards and is banished.
� Fail = target takes 1 damage.
� Fopp = no effect.

Cannot use Transports, Armor or Pets.

characters.Name: Santiago El Robusto
characters.CharSpecial:
Santiago is surrounded by desperados. He can use four different ranged weapons during Fire and OpFire. The weapons do not restrict each other, so each can fire 
at the same target.

characters.Name: Seveneyes
characters.CharSpecial: Free action: Look secretly at the top card of one Guardian deck, or at one Encounter.

characters.Name: Sgt. Gritt
characters.StandardAbilities: Auto Pistol, Auto Rifle, Grenade, Heavy
characters.CharSpecial: Unaffected by beneficial mental abilities.

characters.Name: Sheridan
characters.CharSpecial:
When owning a Mount:
� Enemies within 2 aura at start of each Melee must each reveal 1 card.
� Can move through enemy without stopping.
� Gains +1 Armor.

characters.Name: Shifter
characters.CharSpecial:
Transmutes under stress. Gains a bonus to all marked ratings when each of the following occurs (use unusued markers to keep track):

+1 if Shifter attempts an adventure.
+2 if Shifter Squeaks an adventure.
+1 if Shifter attempts a Hit (once per turn only).
+1 if an enemy attempts a Hit on Shifter.
+1 per attack/event causing damage to Shifter.
+2 when an allied character (not henchman) is killed (not imprisoned).
This bonus cumulates but cannot exceed +6. Free Action: must reduce this bonus by 1.

characters.Name: Siennya, Queen's-Daughter
characters.CharSpecial: Move cost 1 in Swamp.

characters.Name: Sir Bodkin
characters.CharSpecial:
If Sir Bodkin takes damage, he can � if he wishes � immediately move to an empty Dome of his choice, or to his team base HQ.
No event can do more than 1 damage to Sir Bodkin. But, Poison causes full damage.
Cannot end his Move in a space containing 
an enemy character unless forced to.

characters.Name: Sir Gawain
characters.CharSpecial: +1 Damage with Melee cards if riding a Mount.

characters.Name: Smoke
characters.CharSpecial:
Can move through enemies without stopping.
Move cost 2 through Building.

characters.Name: Spartacus
characters.CharSpecial: Can use two Melee cards in the same Melee, as two separate attacks against the same or different targets. The natural melee attack cannot be used this way.

characters.Name: Specialist Njeri
characters.CharSpecial: Free Action: Can heal herself or one ally in her space for 1 Health, if the ally�s current Health is at half Health or less.

characters.Name: Stephen Decatur
characters.CharSpecial:
Can move through but not end movement in Deep Water, at a move cost of 2.
Move cost 1 in Water.

characters.Name: Sterling Jack
characters.CharSpecial:
Mental ability. Instead of a melee attack, can challenge Wits vs. Wits of one enemy in the space. On Amaze, reveal the enemy�s cards. Swap any of Jack�s cards for an equal number of enemy cards, Jack�s choice.
Long Con: At game start, secretly write down the number of enemy team markers that will be on the map at game end. If correct, your team gains 1 Achievement if Jack is alive and unimprisoned.

characters.Name: Suva of Orian
characters.CharSpecial: Natural Electrical Damper. On a melee Hit with a Luck of 5, and if the attack causes damage, the target is killed instantly. This is true only if Suva is using his natural melee attack.

characters.Name: Sven the Netmender
characters.CharSpecial: Untested. When a �?� rating is first needed, check Luck twice. The higher Luck of the two sets that rating for the remainder of the game.

characters.Name: Syriach
characters.CharSpecial: Suffers a -2 penalty on all Adventure challenges except those involving Melee or Point.

characters.Name: Tanika
characters.CharSpecial: Untested. When a �?� rating is first needed, check Luck twice. The higher Luck of the two sets that rating for the remainder of the game.

characters.Name: Tex
characters.CharSpecial:
If he owns a revealed Mount, Tex can Move normally even after 
firing in the Fire phase.

characters.Name: The Iron Pole
characters.CharSpecial:
If he owns a revealed Mount, Tex can Move normally even after 
firing in the Fire phase.

characters.Name: The Scarlet Vixen
characters.CharSpecial: Gains +2 on all Adventure challenges in the enemy team base, including entering the gates. Enemies cannot OpFire at Vixen when she is in either team base.

characters.Name: The Weinstein Brothers
characters.CharSpecial:
Can use all cards regardless of Strength/Intellect, and gains the Bonus with all.
When receiving any card, check Luck. On 0-1, the Brothers take 1 damage and the treasure is discarded. Do not check Luck for the starting cards.

characters.Name: Thorn
characters.CharSpecial:
When dismissed and after choosing a Dome, Thorn can instead appear on a Future space that is within 4 aura of the Dome.
On a Future adventure, Thorn can pay 2 cards to automatically Pass the adventure.

characters.Name: Thotus
characters.CharSpecial:
Gains +3 on Intellect and Wits Adventures.
Mental Ability. Use as a ranged attack with OpFire 1 and Range 5. Stealth bonuses apply. Instead of a Hit, challenge Intellect vs. Intellect:
Pass: Target drops all cards and is banished.
Amaze: Target switches sides. The target becomes an enemy again if Thotus dies.

characters.Name: Three-U
characters.CharSpecial:
Enemy and allied characters that begin their Move phase within 3 aura of Three-U must each check Luck. If Luck is 6-9 and greater than the target�s Wits, he drops all cards and is banished.
Creatures also check Luck. 8-9 = eliminated.
If a Hit against Three-U has Luck of 3 or 7, the attacker hits himself instead. He must make a Damage challenge against his own Armor rating.

characters.Name: Thump
characters.CharSpecial: Rock-thrower. Natural ranged attack as shown, using Throw rating.

characters.Name: TIAX Assassin
characters.CharSpecial:
Before TIAX enters the map, choose an enemy. TIAX can only attack that target. If the target is killed or imprisoned, TIAX chooses a new target, then is banished.
Speed = current Health. Ignores mental abilities. Does not need to stop in an enemy space.
Free Action: 
Regenerates 1 Health if wounded.

characters.Name: Titanium Renegade
characters.CharSpecial:
Move cost 2 through Building.
Move cost 4 through Swamp. 
Cannot use Pets, Transports or Armor.

characters.Name: Tomiji Hamaki
characters.CharSpecial:
Ignores Strength and Intellect requirements for cards. He can use them all.
For challenges involving the payment of 
cards, Tomiji pays one less card.

characters.Name: Ulshasa
characters.CharSpecial:
Can enter Fire,move cost 1. Can remain in Fire.
Ignore Fire for Ulshasa�s ranged attacks.
Anyone damaging Ulshasa with a natural melee attack suffers 1 damage in return.

characters.Name: Undenbog
characters.CharSpecial:
Move cost 1 in Swamp, Water, Deep Water. Can remain in Deep Water. Gains +2 Wits, React, Stealth and melee Hit in such spaces.
Ignore Swamp for Bog�s ranged attacks. 
Does not need to stop when in an enemy space if that space is Swamp or Water.

characters.Name: Vaxiss
characters.CharSpecial:
Immune to poison. If Vaxiss�s natural melee attack causes damage, the target takes an additional 1 poison damage. Machines and Bots are immune to poison.
Move cost 3 through Water, 5 through Swamp.

characters.Name: Venya 8
characters.CharSpecial: Immune to all mental abilities.

characters.Name: Victoria
characters.CharSpecial: On Adventures, Victoria can accept a -2 penalty. If so, treat Pass as Amaze and Fail as Fopp.

characters.Name: Walrus
characters.CharSpecial: Rescue. Usable once in a game. Free Action: If in the space of a dead ally, and no enemies are in the space, the ally is revived with 1 Health.

characters.Name: Whisper
characters.CharSpecial:
Secret Identity. Each Free Action: If an allied character is within 4 aura, Whisper is human. Use left ratings. If not, use right ratings and see below.
Windwraith, Mental ability. Free Action: Enemy characters within 2 aura and with less Wits than Whisper join her side, but only for her turn, switching back at turn end. Cannot use, trade or look at the enemy�s cards.

characters.Name: Whisper
characters.CharSpecial:
Secret Identity. Each Free Action: If an allied character is within 4 aura, Whisper is human. Use left ratings. If not, use right ratings and see below.
Windwraith, Mental ability. Free Action: Enemy characters within 2 aura and with less Wits than Whisper join her side, but only for her turn, switching back at turn end. Cannot use, trade or look at the enemy�s cards.

characters.Name: Wilder
characters.CharSpecial: Can move up to 3 move points in the Move phase even if he fires in the Fire phase.

characters.Name: William Wallace
characters.CharSpecial: Mental ability. Allies within 2 aura gain +1 Hit with all attacks. Does not apply to Wallace himself.

characters.Name: Wintercreak
characters.CharSpecial:
Move cost 0 in Woods, 1 in Swamp, Water. Gains an additional +6 Stealth when in Woods.
Cannot use Armor or Transports.

characters.Name: Xecttyl
characters.CharSpecial:
Move cost � through Cavern. Cannot use Armor or Transports.
Swarming workers. Enemies that begin their Move within 4 aura suffer -1 Speed that turn.
Swarming warriors. During Melee, can make a melee attack on every enemy within 2 aura.

characters.Name: Xin The She-Kelpie
characters.CharSpecial:
Move cost 1 in Water. Can move through but not end in Deep Water at Move cost 1.
One allied character that begins their Move in Xin's space and that is allowed to use Mounts can ride Xin. Ignore the ally's movement abilities. The ally can stop in any space that Xin travels through.

characters.Name: Ygunna Gecha
characters.CharSpecial:
Can do each of the following once per game:
� Mental ability.  Prevent one ranged Hit attempt against Ygunna, if the enemy is a Man with less Wits than Ygunna. Decide before Hit.
� Mental ability. If an enemy with less Wits plans a melee attack against Ygunna, it fails and she makes a free attack back. Decide before the Hit.
� If Ygunna causes damage with her natural melee, add 2 poison damage. Choose after the attack causes damage.

characters.Name: Ylsa
characters.CharSpecial:
Can use each ability below once per game:
Lightning Strike. Point attack, Range 5, Single target, Power 7, Damage 3. One shot only.
Crystal Shield. Free Action: Ylsa gains +6 Armor until the end of her next turn.
Firestorm. Throw attack, Range 4, Area target, Power 1, Damage 4. One shot only.
Portal. Free Action: If in Swamp or Water, place Ylsa and all allies in her space into another Swamp/Water space on the map.

characters.Name: Yori Blackpad
characters.CharSpecial:
For purposes of combat only, Yori gains +1 Hit, +4 Wits, +2 Stealth and +2 React when 
in a Cavern space.

characters.Name: York
characters.CharSpecial: Gains +2 Hit during the Fire phase.

characters.Name: Zane Starblazer
characters.CharSpecial:
Before entering the game, choose one of the following permanent effects:
� Powerflex. Strength becomes 9 and Power 6.
� Vortex Shield. Armor becomes 8.
� Exoflash. Speed becomes 8.
� Omnitrack. Aim, Point and Throw become 9.

characters.Name: Zera Kail
characters.CharSpecial:
With all Aim weapons:
� Gain +2 Hit and +1 Damage against Creatures.
� Increase Range by 4.

characters.Name: Zoe Burroughs
characters.CharSpecial:
Mole. While a mole: Cannot be attacked. Can move through enemies without stopping. Can freely enter the enemy base. At start of Melee, can target one enemy character in her space. Challenge Zo��s Intellect vs. theirs:

� Fopp, Fail:  Discovered! Loses mole status.
� Squeak, Pass: Steals 1 card. Remains a mole.
� Amaze: Steals 2 cards. Remains a mole.
If still a mole, Zo�'s first Hit or enemy base adventure gains a +6 bonus. She loses 
mole status afterward.

characters.Name: Zygoid
characters.CharSpecial:
Single target ranged weapons suffer -1 Damage rating against Zygoid, while Area ranged weapons gain +1 Damage rating.
Gains an additional +2 Stealth when in Woods or Swamp.
